com.bubblerunner.game.utils

Class AssetsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bubblerunner.game.utils.AssetsManager

  • public class AssetsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AssetManager class using a singleton design pattern which loads as the game starts and can be called anywhere on the program. All the public variables are either Textures or Musics which are loaded as soon as the game start.

        public static AssetsManager getInstance()
        Returns the AssetManager instance.
        Returns:
